title: Champa rice and stimulation of agriculture

content.prompt: The increased food production accompanying the introduction of Champa rice into China from Vietnam during the eleventh century best illustrates which of the following?

choices.label: The reliance of China on food imports
The importance of Vietnam to the world economy
The stimulation of agriculture by technological innovation
The influence of China on neighboring societies

topic.text: 1.1: Developments in East Asia from c. 1200 to c. 1450

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
